title: Spacious | 3 storied | House for sale @ Dehiwala
details:
Spacious | 3 storied | House for sale @ Dehiwala

Land & Floor Area -
11.8 perches, (4800sq,ft)

Fully tiled flooring
8 Bedrooms
All rooms having A/C, TV & telephone connections
8 Bathrooms (4 baths not completed)
All baths having solar hot water provitions
Large living open to back yard cannel
Upstair beautiful Sitting / Living & Dining area
Stainless steel open pantry with Store room (Hot water provision)
3rd floor rooftop garden
Generator power provisional ports have been installed
Eye catching front garden with concrete benches
Entire house made by 9 inch bricks walls
Pipe born water with over head water tank
parking space for 3 or 4 vehicles
Surrounded by well built walls with remote & wicket gate
very closed proximity to Dehiwala city limit
walking distance to Nadimala junction
20 Feet wide access road

57 million , 570 Laks (Negotiable)
